title: The Sixth Gun (001 - 042 + TPBs v1 - v4) (2010 - Ongoing) (Digit
description:
The Sixth Gun (001 - 042 + TPBs v1 - v4) (2010 - Ongoing) (Digital) (JK+Zone-Empire)



The Sixth Gun is a post American Civil War story of ancient weapons and supernatural occurrence. "The Six" show up in all forms across the world and its history but their true power and purpose is shrouded in deep Cajun style mystery of this book. In search of money and treasure Drake Sinclair navigates with an unmeasured knowledge of Southern magic until he is reunited with his former acquaintances looking to revive a crazed war veteran, General Hume. Hume and his men carry the estranged "six" in the form of special revolvers, each with its own specific ability. They can raise the dead, predict the future, and grant other unimaginable power. Completely unaware of the world she is about to be thrown into Becky Montcrief mourns the murder of her grandfather and acquires General Hume's piece of "the six". Drake and Becky's journey will attract demons, mysterious magicians, and bloodthirsty immortals in this Oni Press hit title. Cullen Bunn and Brian Hurtt present to you, "The Sixth Gun".

Trade Paperback Collections

Cold Dead Fingers (#1-6)- included
Crossroads (#7-11)- included
Bound (#12-17)- included
A Town Called Penance (#18-23)- included

Winter Wolves (#24-29)
Ghost Dance (#?)
